[center][font size=4]Change Log[/font][/center]

[font size=3]2018.04.29[/font]
- Initial release of the Chronograf template
Name: chronograf
Overview: Chronograf is InfluxData’s open source web application. Use Chronograf with the other components of the TICK stack to visualize your monitoring data and easily create alerting and automation rules.
